description:
Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura`s true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers, confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash of Tears! Hot Blooded Teacher and Student Showdown
Namida no Gekitotsu! Nekketsu Shitei Taiketsu
การปะทะของน้ำตา ศึกสายเลือดครูศิษย์
涙の激突! 熱血師弟対決
